description:
The Awesome Brawlers realize that the connection between Earth and Vestroia is on the verge of disappearing, bringing a new threat to the surface!
Source: Netflix
Note: The first half of Episode 1 streamed on RTL+ Germany on 17.02.2023, followed by the second half on 24.02.2023. The complete series streamed on Netflix US on 01.03.2023 and in Japan it streamed on 31.03.2023.

REGULAR.description:
The invasive Swarm absorbs the Earth`s energy and weakens the planet`s connection with Vestroia. Can the Awesome Brawlers defeat it?
Source: netflix

titles.title: A New Crisis / Magnus, The Leader

REGULAR.description:
Desperate to defeat Hanoj, the Awesome Brawlers find new power in the Nova Core. Will this secret weapon help them win the Battle Judgment?
Source: netflix

titles.title: The Ultimate Bakugan / A New Core

REGULAR.description:
The Awesome Brawlers strive to master the new Nova technique. Lia confronts a bully, and Athena faces an old foe at the Bakugan Academy.
Source: netflix

titles.title: The Nova Technique, Part 1 / The Nova Technique, Part 2

REGULAR.description:
Dan gets frustrated as he struggles to harness the Nova Core power. Dan, Lia and Wynton confront a gang of outlaws threatening an Old West theme park.
Source: netflix

titles.title: New Move Blues / Showdown at Gold Rodeo Park!

REGULAR.description:
Ajit tackles the first Battle Judgment while the others defend Magli Island against the Swarm. Lia and Wynton fight their enemies in the second event.
Source: netflix

titles.title: The Fated First Battle / Time to Brawl!

REGULAR.description:
Lord Brakken`s scheming uncle has seized the throne in Brakistan, where Ajit and Shun face their foes in the third Battle Judgment match.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Back to Brakistan / The Eye of the Sandstorm

REGULAR.description:
The Awesome Brawlers try to capture a Swarm Bakugan in order to access a portal to Vestroia. Viral superstar Cubbo lies during a TV interview.
Source: netflix

titles.title: To Catch a Swarm / The Show Must Go On

REGULAR.description:
Shun and Lightning brawl in the fourth Battle Judgment match in downtown Los Volmos. Dan and Drago fight an old enemy threatening the city.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Attack on Los Volmos / Brawl by the Sea

REGULAR.description:
Dan and Drago confront foes in a Darkavian cave for the fifth Battle Judgment match. Buzzy tries to return stolen energy to the Yucatán Peninsula.
Source: netflix

The Awesome Brawlers launch themselves into the sixth Battle Judgment. Lightning travels into space to represent his fellow dogs in an age-old feud.
Source: netflix

titles.title: Clash in the Capital / Lightning`s Odyssey

REGULAR.description:
Haora`s floating islands set the stage for the seventh Battle Judgment match. Hanoj surprises the Awesome Brawlers in the eighth and final event.
Source: netflix

Drago clashes with Nillious in an epic brawl. Magnus` true intentions become apparent, and the Awesome Brawlers conjure up a plan to trap Hanoj.
Source: netflix

titles.title: An Alliance of Strength / The Ultimate Plan

REGULAR.description:
The Awesome Brawlers and their Bakugan companions clash with Hanoj one last time, exercising all their powers to try to defeat him once and for all.
Source: netflix
